name: 3D Pool Bi-a
description:
3D Pool Bi-a is authentic 3D pool experience like you’ve never seen on mobile.Capture the spotlight in the pubs & pool halls and build you legacy in the most realistic pool game on the planet. Compete against other real players from all around the world or enter tournaments to win trophies against skilled pool players. How about a nice game of pool?

Features
- Real 3D billiards graphics
- Various simulation gameplay to choose
- 120+ levels to challenge
- Customize the cues and pool tables
